data.route_analysis: Guatemala is accessible via La Aurora International Airport, with options for domestic flights to popular cities like Antigua and Flores. Public transportation is available but renting a car or taking shuttles is recommended for flexibility.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best months to visit Guatemala are from November to April, avoiding the rainy season from May to October.
data.climate: Temperatures in Guatemala are generally mild due to altitude; average temperatures range from 60째F (15째C) to 75째F (24째C) during the fall. Visitors should prepare for occasional rain, especially in higher altitudes.
data.culture: Guatemala features rich Maya heritage, colorful markets, and various festivals such as the Day of the Dead celebrations in early November.
